p:
Determination of the p-AVs was carried out as previously described ( Hashempour-Baltork et al., 2017). Samples (1 g) were dissolved in isooctane in a 25 mL volumetric flask and mixed with 1 mL p-anisidine solution (0.25% w/v in 99.5% glacial acetic acid). The mixture was reacted for 10 min in the dark. The absorbance was measured at 350 nm using a UV/VIS spectrophotometer (Optizen 2120 UV Plus, Mecasys Co., Ltd., Daejeon, Korea) and the p-AV was calculated as follows:
p-AV = 25 ×
(
1.2
A s
−
A b
)
/ W
